short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes how closely Google Search titles match the search query using TF-IDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an SEO Chrome Extension that runs on SERP & scores the SERP Titles against the Search Query in terms of TF-IDF Cosine Similarity which helps you understand the relevancy of title to the search query

Use Cases

1️⃣ See relevancy of Titles Against Search Query & Optimize if needed
2️⃣ For a Long Tail Query Identify Outliers who have published content catering closely to such niched queries. The similarity scores can build the confidence to pursue user focused topics
3️⃣ See Scores for Sitelink Extension to measure if there is any correlation between search queries & more similar sitelink extension receiving more CTR
4️⃣ See scores for PAA Ranking Titles to see if there is any correlation between long tail search queries & PAA SERP Titles Cosine Similarity Scores
